prod_short_desc: Thrust Iron Man into battle against evil Thanos!
prod_long_desc:
Play out a fun Mighty Micros battle between two powerful rivals. Iron Man’s car features rear rocket thrusters for fast-play action and includes a wrench to dismantle his enemy’s car. Thanos’ Mighty Micros car features five Infinity gem elements and movable front fingers that resemble the Infinity Gauntlet. Includes two minifigures with mini legs.
Includes Iron Man and Thanos minifigures with mini legs.
Thanos’ Mighty Micros car features five movable fingers and five Infinity gem elements.
Iron Man’s Mighty Micros car features dual rear rocket thrusters.
Use Iron Man’s wrench to dismantle Thanos' Infinity Gauntlet-style car!
Accessory elements include Iron Man's wrench and boosters, and Thanos' Infinity Gauntlet.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Iron Man's Mighty Micros car measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide.
Thanos’ Mighty Micros car measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide.
set: Mighty Micros: Iron Man vs. Thanos
